se.project.storage.repos

Class MaintenanceActivityRepo

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.project.storage.repos.AbstractRepo
      • se.project.storage.repos.MaintenanceActivityRepo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MaintenanceActivityRepoInterface, RepoInterface

    public class MaintenanceActivityRepo
extends AbstractRepo
implements MaintenanceActivityRepoInterface
    Is a DAO that provides method to manipulate Maintenance Activity models.

                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.sql.SQLException
        Assign a Maintenance activity to a maintainer.
        Specified by:
        assignMaintenanceActivity in interface MaintenanceActivityRepoInterface
        Parameters:
        maintenanceActivity - is the activity to be assigned.
        maintainer - is the maintainer who'll work on the activity.
        day - is the day in which the Maintainer will work on that task.
        turn - is the turn in which the Maintainer will work on that task.
        minutes - are the number of minutes the maintainer is available.

        java.io.IOException
